DOC.brief_summary: Dysfunctioning executive functioning , include work memory ( WM ) , related rumination . Findings show work memory capacity ( WMC ) increase training . The current study explore mean double-blind randomized control trial whether adaptive WM training could reduce rumination , anxiety depression sample 98 depressed anxious individual .
DOC.brief_title: A Working Memory Training Decrease Rumination Depressed Anxious Individuals
